message.name: ERR_SERVICESUPPLIER_FV_CLOSED
message.locale: "%1s" is no longer an active service supplier.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_DUPLICATE_HEADER_INFO
message.locale: A return exists for %1s, with the same details. Please, check the return is not a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_LINEITEMS
message.locale: The number of line items entered on the header does not match the number of line items associated with this return.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_FV_TOTALAMOUNT
message.locale: The total amount of the return entered on the header does not match the sum of the amounts of each of the line items associated with this return.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_XFV_RECEIPTDATE
message.locale: The date of a service on a return line item may not be greater than the receipt date of the return. Line item(s) with services on the following date(s) are invalid: %1s.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_INVALID_NOREF
message.locale: The following errors occurred during validation of the supplier return: %1s.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNHEADER_INVALID
message.locale: The following errors occurred during validation of the supplier return with reference number %1s: %2s.

message.name: INF_SUPPLIERRETURNS_PROCESSING
message.locale: Your request for processing of this return has been queued for processing.

message.name: INF_SUPPLIERRETURNS_PRODUCT_ORDERS
message.locale: No products on the system support orders.

message.name: ERR_SUPPLIERRETURNLINEITEM_CONCERN_BANKACCOUNT
message.locale: The default payment method for %1s is EFT. The following clients do not have bank accounts registered: %2s

message.name: ERR_METHOD_OF_ENTRY_MODIFIED
message.locale: The method of entry must not be modified.

message.name: ERR_STATUS_CODE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The supplier return status code must not be modified.
